Colombia: Battle of Chocontá Nemequene becomes zipa of Bacatá (to 1514) Quemuenchatocha becomes zaque of Hunza (to 1537)
India: Ahmadnagar declares independence, followed by Bijapur and Berar in the same year thus breaking up the Bahmani Sultanate.
Ireland: An earthquake takes place at Sliabh Gamh in County Mayo.
